mapper.select: select pro.pro_no as pro_no, pro.pro_name as pro_name, mem.id as id, pro.price as price, bas.ea as ea, pro.PRO_NAME, pro.PRO_IMG, pro.STOCK, bas.BASKET_NO, (price * ea ) order_price from Product pro, MEMBER mem, BASKET bas where pro.pro_no = bas.pro_no and mem.id = bas.id and bas.ID = #{id}
SELECT NVL(SUM(pro.price * ea), 0) money FROM basket bas, product pro WHERE pro.pro_no = bas.pro_no AND bas.id = #{id}
select count(*) from BASKET where id = #{id} and PRO_NO = #{pro_no}
